text: Ni shuo: Zhenzhu a! Guo quan de zhu a! Ni yao ba guo quan shangci shei, jiu shangci shei; ni yao ba guo quan cong shei shouzhong duo qu, jiu cong shei shouzhong duo qu; ni yao shi shei zungui, jiu shi shei zungui; ni yao shi shei bi jian, jiu shi shei bi jian; fuli zhi you ni zhangwo; ni duiyu wanshi, que shi quanneng de.
